Properties of Floor and Ceiling Functions

Partial Functions

DM
Jun 7, 2021

For a partial function $f$ is an assignment of a unique element $a$ (in a subset of Domain of $A$ called domain of definition) to a unique element $b \in B$.

Onto Functions

DM
Jun 7, 2021

A function is called onto or surjection if for every element $b \in B$ there is an element $a \in A$ with $f(a)=b$. Function is called sujective.

One-to-One Functions

DM
Jun 7, 2021

Functions which do not assign same value to two different elements in Domain.
